examples.example: 商场的工作人员热情地接待每一位顾客。

translate.english: The staff in the mall receive every customer warmly.

examples.example: 这位售货员始终微笑着面对每一位顾客，为他们提供贴心的服务。

translate.english: This salesperson always smiles at every customer and provides attentive service to them.

examples.example: 超市的工作人员真诚地服务每一位顾客，致力于让他们有愉快的购物体验。

translate.english: The staff of the supermarket serve every customer sincerely and are committed to giving them a pleasant shopping experience.
